name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Frontend Engineer leveraging my 8 years of experience, I possess a comprehensive skill set in **React**, **Next.js**, **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, **HTML**, **CSS**, **Sass**, and **CSS Modules**. I am adept at creating high-performance, user-centric applications and have a strong proficiency in modern front-end frameworks, ensuring designs are responsive and visually appealing. My background also includes familiarity with tools like **Shopify**, **Shopify Liquid**, **Remix**, **Oxygen**, **Vercel**, and **Cloudflare**, enhancing my capability to develop dynamic web solutions. In my career, I've prioritized communication and collaboration, utilizing platforms such as **Jira**, **Notion**, and **Loom** to drive projects forward effectively.

Additionally, I bring a robust foundation in building solutions for sectors such as healthcare and finance, underpinned by an understanding of compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. My approach integrates thoughtful design awareness while aligning technical execution with business goals, ensuring that every application I build not only meets user needs but also achieves strategic objectives.
